text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
All righty! Thanks to the school we<n>have everything we
need! Since it's<n>everyone's first time playing karuta,<n>let's
go over the rules.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Our variant involves two teams of<n>four, but just like in
regular karuta,<n>you listen for the first half of a poem,<n>then
take the card with the second<n>half on it!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
So the only differences are the size of<n>the cards... and that
you have to run to<n>get them?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
That's right! We run, and sometimes<n>clash... It's called the
martial art of the<n>humanities for good reason!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Each team splits into "finders" and<n>"takers." Basically,
people who look<n>for the matching card, and those who<n>go
and get it.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hm... Well, who better to give<n>commands than yours truly? I,
T.M.<n>Opera O, shall don the mantle of<n>finder. Are you
ready, Doto?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Y-yes! Th-that means I'm a taker.<n>I-I'll do my best!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
All right then, Urara, that leaves us to<n>pair up. Think you're
up to be a<n>finder?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Okie dokie! I'll give it a shot!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I'm pretty sure there are more rules,<n>but I'm no expert
either. So why don't<n>we learn by doing and give it a go!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
First things first, our reciter will be this<n>nifty app... The
conveniences of<n>modern life, am I right? Okay then...

text_block_list.name: Reciter App
text_block_list.text:
Springtime is now upon us, the<n>blossoming plum declares...<n>
Umamusume, go forth unto the finishâ€”

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Now off with you Doto, upon wings of<n>gold! To the south,
secondo da destra!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Wha? S-south? You mean this way?<n>Or this way?! Oooh,
wh-which way is<n>it?!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Hmm, so what am I supposed to be<n>finding?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Urara! It's "Negishi's trodden turf<n>heights"! Look for the one
that starts<n>with "ne"!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Ne... ne... Found it! Fuku, over there!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Where's there?! I've never heard<n>more ambiguous
directions!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Oooh, which way's south?! I<n>th-th-think that side gets
sunlight in the<n>morning, which means...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Oh no no, not Meisho "Doh"-to! Run<n>straight or you'll crash
into someone!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Huh? There's two "ne" cards. Hey,<n>Fuku, which one do we
want?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Bwoohh?! Urara, the one that goes<n>"ne" then "gi"!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Wait, "gi"? Then this is the wrong<n>one... wh-whoa! M-my
foot!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Hyikes! Doto, this isn't the time to be<n>practicing twirls!
Waaah!

text_block_list.name: Doto & Fukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Owww!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Well, that was such a disaster I<n>almost feel refreshed!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Nnghh... Sorry, if only I wasn't so<n>clumsy...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Nonsense, Doto, it's not your fault!<n>We're all beginners
here, after all!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
But... if I didn't trip, I wouldn't have<n>brought you down with
me...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
No worries, no worries. It's not like<n>you did it on purpose,
we all know<n>that.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Plus, did you forget already? Shiraoki<n>foretold that if we join
forces in a<n>competition, great, great fortune<n>awaits!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Which means, if we all enter the<n>karuta tournament together,
then win<n>or lose, good fortune will be ours!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: What?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
B-but... can we really say we "joined<n>forces" if all we do is
show up?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Of course we can! Imagine the great<n>Shiraoki telling
amateurs like us "You<n>better win!" She would never.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
As long as we all take part and have<n>fun, everyone goes
home happy!<n>That's what she wanted to get<n>across, if
you ask me!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Th-that kind of makes sense...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Still, I shouldn't be tripping left and<n>right. Wouldn't want
anyone getting<n>hurt... I really need to practice...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Now, now, wipe that worry off your<n>face. Where smiles
bloom, fortune<n>looms!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Well, if I may... At times, a little<n>rehearsal is in order! So as
your<n>commander, allow me to ask you<n>this...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
When you think "commander," does<n>this strike you as a
fitting pose? Or<n>perhaps this?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Whoa, so cool! I wanna try too!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Ooh, looking good! But why not take ita step further, like this?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
(They're all so... motivated. Ohh, I<n>need to practice so I don't
screw up...)
